headline: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU): A Bear Case Theory
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU) on Substack by Kroker Equity Research. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on LULU. Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU)’s share was trading at $399.60 as of Dec 6th. LULU’s trailing and forward P/E were 28.89 and 26.32 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Lululemon Athletica […]

headline: Putting Your Marathon Time on Your Résumé: Healthy Fun or Cringey Flex?
summary: Brad Thomas,  a New York City-based recruiter, reads hundreds of résumés every month.  Take the machine-learning engineer who boasted about 20 ultra-trail-running events, 15 marathons, a 100-kilometer walk—and a sportswear sponsorship.  More than a conversation starter, sports achievements can be a way to highlight workplace-valued traits, many fitness fans and recruiters say.
